div.p: Again it depends on what sort of environment you work in because for me as a manager and employing staff I look for
commitment, honesty, yeah I think that would be 2 elements that I would look for in the sort of work that I do but it depends on
what sort of work environment you go into but I think honesty and commitment; you want staff who you can share ideas with
and sort of share your vision and I do believe when you’ve got a staff team that is not just about having a team it’s about being
a family as well and I know people say you shouldn’t mix business with pleasure but for me it works well that I’m very close with
all my staff and we’ve got a real good rapport with each other. It depends what environment you work in, I’ve been a victim of
bullying in previous jobs when I was younger so I think treat others how you want to be treated so some people might say
I’m a bit soft but as I say I’ve never had any problems with any of my staff as yet...
